text: Tár is a 2022 psychological drama movie written and directed by Todd Field and stars Cate Blanchett, Nina Hoss, Noémie Merlant, Sophie Kauer, Julian Glover, Allan Corduner, and Mark Strong. Tár premiered at the 79th Venice International Film Festival in September 2022. It was released on October 28, 2022, by Focus Features to positive reviews. The American Film Institute named it one of the top 10 films of the year. At the 95th Academy Awards, Tár received six nominations including Best Picture, Best Director for Field, Best Actress for Blanchett, and Field for Best Original Screenplay. ==References== Category:2022 movies
title: Tár
